company.name: binBuddy
company.description: Welcome to binBuddy - your best friend for waste management!
company.mission: binBuddy is the leading waste management application, dedicated to making a positive impact on the environment. Our platform simplifies waste sorting and recycling for users of all ages. Our mission is to promote ecological sustainability by providing a user-friendly platform that encourages responsible waste disposal.

howToUse.text: Simply download our application from the app store and create an account. We will provide you with guidance on how to best recycle or dispose of items.

ourVision.text: We aim to inspire a global revolution in waste management. We offer tools, resources, and support to collectively build a world without waste, where every action has a positive ecological impact.

joinUs.text: Join the binBuddy community and become a promoter of sustainable living. Let your everyday actions make a difference in preserving the planet Earth!
